entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
